attributes.action: Regulate or ban the breeding of rats and mice for animal food
attributes.additional_details:
Currently there doesn't appear to be any regulations regarding the breeding of rodents for animal (such as snake) food, as a result the equivalent of battery farms are in existence for rats and mice.

This also means that they are killed in a variety of inhumane manners, depending upon the breeder: methods of execution include freezing whilst alive, gas chambers, suffocation in plastic bags, smacking them against walls or pulling their tails to snap their spinal cords.

If this was a human food source, this behaviour would not be tolerated.
